author: shazron
msg: Added t4 templates to generate GapSourceDictionary.xml and phonegap-1.0.0.js

Note that the build script was removed, and to re-generate the files from the templates you will need to click on the "Transform All Templates" button in Solution Explorer, or right-click on the .tt file and select "Custom Tool". An alternative to run the templates on each build is to install http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ee847423.aspx
